rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible entrance area with North-facing main door and tactile paving leading to a spacious, open foyer.
Central living space adjacent to the courtyard for natural ventilation, ample daylighting, and integration with Vastu principles ensuring balance and positive energy flow.
Open dining area seamlessly connected to the living room and kitchen; designed for family gatherings with ample seating arrangements and easy accessibility.
Functional kitchen with modern appliances, sufficient storage, and ergonomic design ensuring wheelchair accessibility with adjustable countertops.
Spacious bedroom with a north-facing balcony for natural light and fresh air; designed to be accessible with wide doorways and barrier-free access to the balcony.
Well-lit bedroom featuring a private south or east-facing balcony ensuring privacy while benefiting from natural light; wheelchair accessible with proper door clearances.
Cozy bedroom adjacent to the master bedroom with a private balcony space for fresh air and relaxation; designed for easy mobility.
Additional bedroom with south or east exposure including a small balcony area; accessible design ensures ease of movement.
Balcony-enhanced bedroom providing personal outdoor space and natural light; designed with wheelchair accessibility in mind.
Main bathroom centrally located for ease of access from multiple rooms, equipped with grab bars, wider doorways, and slip-resistant flooring for safety.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible North-facing main entrance door leading directly into the lobby area with smooth transition to courtyard.
Large east-facing window in living room providing ample daylight and ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles.
Doorway from the central courtyard to various rooms ensuring natural light distribution and open space connectivity.
Balcony door for Master Bedroom providing access to the north-facing balcony with unobstructed views and fresh air.
Balcony door for Bedroom 2 ensuring privacy and ample natural light from the east side of the apartment.
Balcony door for Bedroom 3 with accessible design and space for movement.
Balcony door for Bedroom 4 providing access to a small outdoor area designed per Vastu guidelines.
Balcony door for Bedroom 5 ensuring fresh air and light with a south-facing orientation.
